NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color> Clue: There is another QM locator on BH and you can learn to use the rule of imaging from afar there?
1
SOLANUM: Ilex, it is good to see you today!
2
1
SOLANUM: You have my gratitude for being my set of eyes during my pilgrimage today to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon.</color>
3 2
ILEX: Of course, my friend. I only hope you will be my set of eyes as well, when it is my turn!
4
3
ILEX: However, I was curious: was there a reason we needed to travel to <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> today?
5
4
ILEX: To be more precise, was there a reason we could not have used the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> back on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow?</color>
6
5
SOLANUM: That is a wise question, my friend.. I'm afraid I do not know the answer.
7
6
SOLANUM: I shall be returning to <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> shortly to begin my expedition. If time allows, I shall try to visit the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> to inquire Bells about it!
BH_QML R1 5
BH_QML R2 5
BH_QML R3 7
